languages.text: "Не верю сама, что соглашаюсь со святошей... но да, наконец-то этот мерзавец поплатится за то, что сделал!"
"I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"
languages.original_text: "Не верю сама, что соглашаюсь со святошей... но да, наконец-то этот мерзавец поплатится за то, что сделал!"

"I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

languages.text: “我真不敢相信我居然会赞同那个道貌岸然的修女……不过，没错，那个人渣必须为他的所作所为付出代价！”
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: “我真不敢相信我居然会赞同那个道貌岸然的修女……不过，没错，那个人渣必须为他的所作所为付出代价！”

languages.text: « Pour une fois, je suis d'accord avec l'Adepta Sermonitas... Cette pourriture doit payer pour ce qu'il a fait ! »
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: « Pour une fois, je suis d'accord avec l'Adepta Sermonitas... Cette pourriture doit payer pour ce qu'il a fait ! »

languages.text: «No puedo creer que esté de acuerdo con la Adepta Santurrona... ¡pero sí, ese desgraciado pagará por lo que ha hecho!».
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo creer que esté de acuerdo con la Adepta Santurrona... ¡pero sí, ese desgraciado pagará por lo que ha hecho!».

languages.text: 「修道聖女会と同意見だなんて我ながら信じられないけど…賛成、あの卑怯者には自分の行いを償ってもらうわ！」
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: 「修道聖女会と同意見だなんて我ながら信じられないけど…賛成、あの卑怯者には自分の行いを償ってもらうわ！」

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht fassen, dass ich Adepta Scheinheiligus zustimme ... aber ja, dieses Arschloch wird für seine Taten bezahlen!"
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nicht fassen, dass ich Adepta Scheinheiligus zustimme ... aber ja, dieses Arschloch wird für seine Taten bezahlen!"

languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

languages.text: "Bu konuda Vaaz Rahibesi'ne katıldığıma inanamıyorum ama evet. O şerefsiz, yaptıklarının bedelini ödeyecek!"
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I'm agreeing with Adepta Sanctimonious here... but yes, that scumbag is going to pay for what he's done!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuda Vaaz Rahibesi'ne katıldığıma inanamıyorum ama evet. O şerefsiz yaptıklarının bedelini ödeyecek!"
